categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Tom Rodgers is an actor and stunt performer who portrays the Knight of Ren Trudgen in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He also served as a stunt double for the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.

Rodgers has more than eighty stunt credits to his name, including famous Hollywood movies such as Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom, Justice League , Avengers: Age of Ultron, Thor: The Dark World (starring fellow Star Wars actor Natalie Portman) and Snow White and the Huntsman.
